title: We are the Software Engineering team
intro: Building software that makes things happen at AlphaSights
author: @carlosepp

index.title: We are THE Software Development team
index.intro: Building software that makes things happen at AlphaSights

values.title: Humble
values.description: We value feedback on our work, whether it is positive or negative feedback

values.title: Naturally interested in programming
values.description: We would be programming for fun even if it wasn't our job

values.title: Care about things
values.description: We have original viewpoints and like to argue our case

values.title: Teachers
values.description: We enjoy the process of bringing others up to speed

values.title: Community connected
values.description: We know what is going on around us in the development community.
